name: Lobster Revolution [Demo]
description:
Craig is a simple crustacean. He never thought much about the Lobarchy, until he mounted a revolution against them. In this demo of Lobster Revolution, play as Craig as he learns to embrace his newfound position as a revolutionary leader to take down the Lobarchy!

Lobster Revolution is an Adventure-Card-Game made for the Royalty Free Lobster Game Jam inspired by the Royalty Free Lobster Drawing published by AdultSwim.

Created by members of the Video Game Development Club at UCI
